channel.title: Hits on pi!
channel.description: help plz how i sort this out when i hit it shows to hit marks . when i spwan items its giveing me to so realy giveing me to of every think idk why ? help plz

item.title: Hits on pi!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“pkryan, post:4, topic:445131”]this it ?

                            if (Server.playerHandler.players[j].goodDistance(c.absX, c.absY, npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 15)) {
                                    if (npcs[i].attackType == 2) {
                                            if (!c.prayerActive[16]) {
                                                    if (Misc.random(500) + 200 > Misc.random(c.getCombat().mageDef())) {
                                                            int dam = Misc.random(max);
                                                            c.dealDamage(dam);
                                                            c.handleHitMask(dam,2,2);[/quote]

more specifically that.

Read full topic
